price: Shin, hukuncin Jãhiliyya* suke nema? Kuma wane ne mafi kyau ga hukunci daga Allah sabõda mutãne waɗanda suke yin yaƙĩni (tabbataccen ĩmãni)?
arabic: أَفَحُكۡمَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِيَّةِ يَبۡغُونَۚ وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ حُكۡمٗا لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ
footnotes: * Hukuncin Jahiliyya shi ne wanda ake ginawa a kan son rai da al'ãda da kuma ra'ayin azzalumai, ba ya da wani asali daga wani littafi na Allah.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afaḥuk'ma al-jāhiliyati yabghūna waman aḥsanu mina al-lahi ḥuk'man liqawmin yūqinūna
